A thread (thread)

Date:
2008/05/04 16:21
Author:
Lutz Dittrich, Sergio Montenegro

Copyright 2008 DLR

A Thread is an active schedulable object with own context and stack

Definition in file thread.h.

Define Documentation

#define AT (   _time)    { Thread::suspendCallerUntil(_time); }

AT is a shortcut to wait until a time point. use AT(time); .... to suspend for always use AT(END_OF_TIME);
